message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500. What do you think?
Thanks Alice, that's a good starting point. I'm interested, but I'm looking to spend closer to $8000. Would you be willing to consider $8500?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $9000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm still hoping to get closer to my target price. How about $8750? This feels like a fair price for both of us.
I understand you're trying to get as close to your target price as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $8900?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my target price. How about $8800? This feels like a good compromise for both of us.
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $8900?
